about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling roguelite adventure where your wits and your backpack are your greatest weapons. In Papercraft Tactics, every item you collect and every choice you make shapes your journey. Traverse through branching paths filled with perilous encounters, clever puzzles, and fearsome foes, all leading to an epic boss battle.

Combine and optimize the treasures you discover to create the ultimate loadout, ensuring your survival against escalating challenges. With a dark, hand-drawn art style inspired by real life art and animation, immerse yourself in a world where strategy, luck, and resourcefulness are the keys to victory. Will your backpack carry you to triumph—or weigh you down into defeat?
detailed_description:
Embark on a thrilling roguelite adventure where your wits and your backpack are your greatest weapons. In Papercraft Tactics, every item you collect and every choice you make shapes your journey. Traverse through branching paths filled with perilous encounters, clever puzzles, and fearsome foes, all leading to an epic boss battle.

Combine and optimize the treasures you discover to create the ultimate loadout, ensuring your survival against escalating challenges. With a dark, hand-drawn art style inspired by real life art and animation, immerse yourself in a world where strategy, luck, and resourcefulness are the keys to victory. Will your backpack carry you to triumph—or weigh you down into defeat?
name: Papercraft Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.2GHz Dual Core +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In Papercraft Tactics, your backpack is your lifeline. Navigate branching paths, battle fierce foes, and collect powerful items to craft the ultimate loadout. With a dark, hand-drawn style, every choice matters in this thrilling roguelite adventure. Will you survive?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
